Amazon
Class AmazonAds

class AmazonAds

Retrieving advertizements via the Amazon product API

Authors:
Andreas Itzchak Rehberg (Izzy)

Constructor Detail

AmazonAds()

void AmazonAds(string $public, string $private, string $associate_tag, [string $local_site])

Initialize the class with your credentials

Parameters:
public - Public key to be used
private - Private string to be used
associate_tag - Amazon Partner ID
local_site - Amazon site to query (e.g. 'com','de', â€¦), defaults to 'de'

Method Detail

getCache()

integer getCache(string $cachename, string& $content)

Load from cache if available

Parameters:
cachename - Name of the cache object
content - Where to place the content in
Returns:
cacheAge (UnixTimeStamp; 0 if no cache)

getItemByAsin()

array getItemByAsin(integer $asin_code, [string $response_group])

Return details of a product searched by ASIN

Parameters:
asin_code - ASIN code of the product to search (comma-separated list)
response_group - Response-Group. Defaults to 'Medium'.
Returns:
SearchResults (or empty array if none): int cachedate (UnixTime), array[0..n] of array of strings title,url,img,price

getItemByKeyword()

array getItemByKeyword(string $keyword, string $product_type, [integer $limit], [float $similarity])

Return details of a product searched by keyword. Search is done in titles and descriptions, max 10 results are returned

Parameters:
keyword - space separated list of keywords to search
product_type - type of the product (only one SearchIndex! If more shall be queried, use getItemsByKeyword() instead)
limit - How many results do we want? Defaults to 3; set to "0" for all-we-can-get
similarity - percentage of maximum allowed similarity of the titles. Defaults to 90; set to 0 to keep all
Returns:
SearchResults (or empty array if none): int cachedate (UnixTime), array[0..n] of strings title,url,img,price

getItemsByKeyword()

array getItemsByKeyword(string $keyword, string $product_type, [integer $limit], [float $similarity])

Return details of a product searched by keyword. Wrapper to getItemByKeyword() which takes care for multiple SearchIndexes (product_types)

Parameters:
keyword - space separated list of keywords to search
product_type - type of the product (comma separated list of SearchIndexes)
limit - How many results do we want? Defaults to 3; set to "0" for all-we-can-get
similarity - percentage of maximum allowed similarity of the titles. Defaults to 90; set to 0 to keep all
Returns:
SearchResults (or empty array if none): int cachedate (UnixTime), array[0..n] of strings title,url,img,price

removeSimilar()

void removeSimilar(array& $items, [float $similarity])

Remove items which are too similar. We certainly don't want just a list of harddisks from the same manufacturer in all sizes, for example

Parameters:
items - [0..n] of array title,url,img,price
similarity - percentage of maximum allowed similarity of the titles. Defaults to 90
